import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Link } from "react-router-dom" import select from 'react-select' import './style.css' const Place = ({selected, setSelected}) => { const [ isActive, setIsActive ] = useState(false); const options = ['An Giang', 'Đồng Tháp'] return ( <>
setIsActive(!isActive)}> Tỉnh thành
{options.map(option => (
setSelected(option)} className="dropdown-item"> {options}
))}
) } export default Place
